headerDisplay:
This plugin creates a switch called **Disarm Somfy Protect** that communicates with the Somfy Protect plugin's HTTP API to disarm your alarm via HomeKit automations.

‚ö†Ô∏è **IMPORTANT:** The Somfy Protect plugin must have the HTTP API enabled (httpPort setting). Both plugins can run on child bridges.

httpPort.title: Somfy Protect HTTP API Port
httpPort.description: The HTTP port that the Somfy Protect plugin is listening on. Must match the httpPort setting in Somfy Protect plugin.

httpToken.title: HTTP API Token (Optional)
httpToken.description: The authentication token if you configured httpToken in the Somfy Protect plugin. Leave blank if no token is set.
